title: Lincoln's WARNING #100006: Housing Market Concerns
script: They say housing market concerns. But who's 'they'? The ones who profit when you panic. Fear merchants moving weight like pharmaceutical reps. Your anxiety's their quarterly earnings. Break the cycle. Scan QR. Stop scrolling. Housing Market Concerns? They're selling you fear while pocketing profit. Classic misdirection. Now you know what they didn't want you to see. Support truth. Bitcoin below.
